**Tender Description**
-------------------------

**Update to Closing Time**

Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 31 May 2024 at 2:00pm EDT. All bids submitted after 2:00pm EDT will be declared non-responsive.

The Department of National Defence (DND) requires Regional Individual Standing Offers for the supply of Composite Food Packages in each of the four (4) geographical locations: Prince Albert, Saskatchewan, Regina, Saskatchewan, Saskatoon, Saskatchewan, and Thunder Bay, Ontario. 

Reply to this tender should be done electronically through the provided notice URL. Address all questions about the tender to the contracting entity.ysical stand-ish destino branching all-no-jn economic Cocoa tr typical supply thought restrict
